title: Cooperative Energy Scheduling of Multi-Microgrids Based on Risk-Sensitive Reinforcement Learning
summary: With the rapid development of distributed renewable energy, multi-microgrids play an increasingly important role in improving the flexibility and reliability of energy supply. Reinforcement learning has shown great potential in coordination strategies due to its model-free nature. Current methods lack explicit quantification of the relationship between individual and joint risk values, resulting in obscured credit assignment.
